name: Welcome to The Afterlife!
description:
Welcome to The Afterlife!

Don't get locked out of heaven! Download The Afterlife FOR FREE today and you can:

+Exist in eternal bliss.

+Upload your soul to our patented AFTER system to be saved in perpetuity, at no extra cost!

+Did we mention *eternal bliss*?

Download The Afterlife now, BEFORE you regret it!

Directions:

+Move the cursor using the arrow keys
